aiValidation.expectedBehavior: MCP Sampling E2E test demonstrating multi-model delegation. The server should start, client connects via MCP SSE, sends a weather query. The server uses MCP Sampling to delegate creative poem generation to LLM providers. Success is indicated by: (1) MCP sampling logs showing the sampling flow occurred, (2) A creative poem or response about weather being generated. The exact format of poems may vary - what matters is that creative weather-related content was produced through the MCP Sampling mechanism.

successCriteria.validationNote: Tests MCP Sampling flow - AI validates creative output quality rather than exact string matching
